humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that metastatic carcinoma was identified in 8 out of 20 axillary lymph nodes (part D right modified radical mastectomy) which corresponds to N3 stage based on the AJCC staging system (New Rule 13).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma identified in 6 out of 6 lymph nodes in level 3 (right axillary lymph node sampling), and metastatic carcinoma identified in 8 out of 20 axillary lymph nodes in the right modified radical mastectomy specimen. The N stage is determined by the number of involved lymph nodes and the location of the nodes. N2 stage indicates metastasis in 1-3 axillary lymph nodes or in infraclavicular (level III) lymph nodes.
